column2: "Not enough ARKS these days know about the FUN Shop! It's such a shame, if you ask me!"
"The FUN Shop is just in the building right next to the My Room Shop right over there..."
"Even as we speak, I can feel the specter of anxiety rearing its ugly head! You, go have a look right now!"
"You know what you've got to do. The FUN Shop! Go. to. the. FUN Shop!"
"Well, what are you waiting for? It's not rocket science. Go put my mind at ease, already!"
